{"id":721885811,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 6 months","timestamp":1655191588,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"25 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/721885811/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Operation for Two Strings","memory":"12.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        int m=word1.length();\n        int n=word2.length();\n        if(m==0 && n==0)\n            return 0;\n        if(m==0)\n            return n;\n        if(n==0)\n            return m;\n        vector<vector<int> >dp(m + 1, vector<int>(n + 1));\n\t    for(int i = 0; i <= m; i++) \n        {\n            for(int j = 0; j <= n; j++)\n            {\n\t\t\t    if(i==0 || j==0) \n                    dp[i][j] = i + j; \n\t\t\t    else if(word1[i - 1] == word2[j - 1])\n                    dp[i][j]=dp[i - 1][j - 1];\n                else\n                    dp[i][j]=1 + min(dp[i - 1][j], dp[i][j - 1]);\n            }\n        }\n        return dp[m][n];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-operation-for-two-strings","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
